name: Rail Rush
overview:
Rail Rush Ticket Redemption Arcade Machine from Coastal Amusements is a new and exciting video arcade game based on the popular mobile app. Rail Rush is one of the most popular mobile games with over 37 million downloads to date and now has been given to life as a coin-operated arcade game.

Rail Rush is a quick game for those with a keen eye. During the game players step into the cart and begin exploring the Rail Rush world by accelerating through insanely fast rails and avoiding obstactles that fall into their path. The players job is to collect precious stones, however there are surprises along the way and special gifts to earn. Break rock eggs to reveal the special gifts and pick up all of the gems for your personal collection.

Players can also equip their with power ups to extend their chances inside the mine, while completing missions and ranking up, in order to become the ultimate explorer!
